headline: Citigroup (C) Extends Agreements With Banco de Chile For Global Connectivity Through 2029
summary: In a recent development on August 29, 2025, Citigroup (C) extended several key agreements with Banco de Chile, underscoring their commitment to long-term collaboration in the financial sector. Over the last quarter, Citigroup's share price advanced 28.21%, possibly buoyed by this partnership alongside other strategic endeavors such as Payoneer's collaboration with Citi on blockchain-enhanced treasury transfers and increased dividends following a successful stress test. Despite the market's...

headline: Does Citi’s 58.9% Rally Signal More Room Ahead After the Federal Reserve Rate Pause?
summary: If you’ve been watching Citigroup stock, it’s hard not to notice the eye-catching run it has experienced lately. Year-to-date gains are up 38.1%, and over the past twelve months, shareholders have seen an impressive 58.9% return. The bullish trend extends over the long haul as well, with the stock essentially doubling over the last three and five years. Recently, other major banks have helped support financial stocks as the market recalibrates its view of recession risks in light of...
